thread.title: BRIEF-J C Penney Says Will Close Milwaukee Distribution, Customer Care Center Beginning This Summer‍​

title: BRIEF-J C Penney Says Will Close Milwaukee Distribution, Customer Care Center Beginning This Summer‍​

organizations.name: brief-j c penney says will close milwaukee distribution
reuters) - j c penney company inc

text: 43 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-J C Penney Says Will Close Milwaukee Distribution, Customer Care Center Beginning This Summer‍​ Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - J C Penney Company Inc: * SAYS WILL BE CLOSING ITS MILWAUKEE DISTRIBUTION AND CUSTOMER CARE CENTER BEGINNING THIS SUMMER‍​ * SAYS SAYS ABOUT 670 ASSOCIATES ARE IMPACTED BY THE CLOSURE OF MILWAUKEE FACILITY‍​ * SAYS DISTRIBUTION CENTER PORTION OF MILWAUKEE FACILITY WILL CEASE OPERATIONS ON JULY 1, AND CUSTOMER CARE CENTER WILL CLOSE ON SEPT 1 * SAYS PLAN TO TRANSFER CUSTOMER CARE ACTIVITIES IN MILWAUKEE TO CO‘S LENEXA CENTER * SAYS SUPPLY CHAIN NETWORK “OVERSIZED” RELATIVE TO NATIONAL STORE FOOTPRINT, CAN BE OPTIMIZED BY TRANSFERRING OPERATIONS TO FACILITIES IN LENEXA, COLUMBUS Further company coverage:
